#summary j2534-logger API documentation

= Introduction =

j2534-logger is a shim DLL that sits between a J2534-application and a J2534-device. It records debugging information about the API calls and can write that information to a file.

= Details =

This library exports all standard PassThru functions, plus a few new functions that control the logging.

== PassThruLoadLibrary ==
{{{
extern "C" long J2534_API PassThruLoadLibrary(
   char * szFunctionLibrary
);
}}}

*szLibrary*: Pointer to FunctionLibrary string.

== PassThruWriteToLogA ==
== PassThruWriteToLogW ==
{{{
extern "C" long J2534_API PassThruWriteToLogA(
   char *szMsg
);
extern "C" long J2534_API PassThruWriteToLogW(
   wchar_t *szMsg
);
}}}

== PassThruSaveLog ==
{{{
extern "C" long WINAPI PassThruSaveLog(
   char *szFilename
);
}}}

*szFilename*: Pointer to the output filename string.

== PassThruUnloadLibrary ==
{{{
extern "C" long WINAPI PassThruUnloadLibrary();
}}}
